viirs/

get_viirs_lat_lon.pro


top source GET_VIIRS_LAT_LON

result = GET_VIIRS_LAT_LON(FILENAME, VERBOSE=VERBOSE)

Return value

STRUCT.LAT : LATITUDE IN DEGREES FOR L1B PRODUCT STRUCT.LON : LONGITUDE IN DEGREES FOR L1B PRODUCT

COMMON BLOCKS: NONE

Parameters

FILENAME in required type=string or string array

a string containing the filename of the product for geolocaiton extraction

Keywords

VERBOSE

PROCESSING STATUS OUTPUTS
